title: New programme
body: Rito, can we please have an option for where we can block someone so we cannot play with them unless we decide to unblock them? Ty, feeders and bad decision makers are ruining my time on the game.{{summoner:2}} {{item:3151}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, this is very unlikely to be implemented. 
Your queue times would end up much worse than they currently are, as you would be taking away a significant portion of people you could be matched with (people who have a bad game would be blocked, people who derp up would be blocked) on our already relatively tiny server. 

If these "feeders" and "bad decision makers" are ruining your game this much, I would suggest [creating/ joining a premade 5](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) for either dynamic queue or norms. This way, you can learn each others play styles, build long lasting friendships, have A+ communication and less toxicity. You even get bonus IP and mastery points.
